content: ----------------------------- join us crocheting a lovely mystery blanket in 5 colours of drops ♥ you #7 **materials 850g of drops ♥ you #7 you can buy this as kit starting from ** 17 € / 23 80 usd / 170 nok / 187 sek / 153 dkk / 24 20 chf / 13 60 £ **size** the blanket will consist of a centre of granny squares surrounded by several types of edges with different patterns and stitches first half of the cal will be the granny squares second half the edges surrounding them to make the blanket bigger you can 1 make more granny squares to make the centre bigger 2 make more row of each pattern around the square calculate ca 48 g of yarn per 8 squares **schedule** you will find new clues for the meadow cal on our facebook page and on the drops lessons 3 - and the date for each clue will be revealed in our schedule here 4 **skill level** we will be combining several crochet techniques and stitches some simple and others a bit more advanced but if you are new to crochet do not worry all the clues for the mystery blanket will be followed with a detailed drops lesson and video **so this is a perfect little cal to learn how to crochet or brush up your skills ** use #dropscal #themeadow to tag your projects on instagram and facebook or join us on the drops workshop 5 for extra help and inspiration or sign up for the newsletter to receive clues and news here 6 #dropsalong 5 https //www facebook com/groups/dropsworkshop/ 6 http //eepurl com/bsd9wf
